id: scenario-value-scanner-teen-scenarios-family-teen participates in family governance decisions with real voice
title: Teen participates in family governance decisions with real voice
description: Teen participates in family governance decisions with real voice
content:
Scenario: Teen participates in family governance decisions with real voice
    Given the family is making decisions about a major purchase (new appliance)
    And Jasmine has accumulated significant care contributions
    And she has relevant knowledge and preferences
    When the family_elohim facilitates the decision process
    Then Jasmine's voice should carry weight in the decision
    And her input should be solicited and genuinely considered
    And she should participate as a junior partner, not just be consulted
    And the family should make decisions that reflect all members' input
    And Jasmine should learn that her participation in family governance is legitimate
    And the decision process should prepare her for adult household management
